Articles.Content:
Here in Australia, it's the anniversary of the original landing. The dateline means I've got a different date to most of you; but here it is.

I celebrate the occasion every year with two movies. One is a 2019 documentary, using all the 'previously unseen' footage from the mission. The other is an Aussie comedy called The Dish, which is a truly fun film.

I tried this four times in KSP before I succeeded in the Mun and Back. Apollo 11 did it on the first try, with the computers messed up.
